meanings.sent1: The autoclaved tools were completely clean and safe to use.
meanings.sent2: The autoclaved medical instruments were ready for surgery.
meanings.sent3: The autoclaved laboratory equipment was so shiny, it looked like new.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and sterilized as an autoclaved tool.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the autoclaved towels reminded her of a fresh start.

meanings.definition: Subjected to a process of sterilization using an autoclave.
meanings.sent1: The autoclaved bottles were free from any harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent2: The autoclaved jars preserved the food for a longer time.
meanings.sent3: The autoclaved petri dishes were the envy of the laboratory.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt as clear and autoclaved as the sterilized equipment.
meanings.sent5: The autoclaved masks provided a sense of security during the experiment.
